source_documents.type: Michael Wolff strategy email to Epstein legal team
Sultan Bin Sulayem email about Trump
Wolff sends Trump article to Epstein
Jonathan Farkas - White House Fellowship appointment

kathy_ruemmler_connection.identity: Kathryn Ruemmler - Obama White House Counsel 2011-2014, later Latham & Watkins partner
kathy_ruemmler_connection.nature: Personal friend, legal advisor, regular correspondent

key_communications.content: Ruemmler to Epstein: 'Trump is living proof of the adage that it is better to be lucky than smart'
Ruemmler planning to drive to NY to visit Epstein: 'Going up to NY Friday morning'
Epstein: 'you can drive right to me and i will feed you' - Ruemmler: 'Great'
Ruemmler: 'The Trump success is seriously scary'
Ruemmler CC'd on Wolff's anti-Trump strategy email to Epstein legal team
Epstein sends Breitbart article about Bill's sex accusers; Ruemmler: 'What's more disturbing is that you are reading breitbart'
Ruemmler: 'I am about to go on stage. The first part of my presentation is about Trump'

kathy_ruemmler_connection.significance: Obama's former White House Counsel maintained close personal relationship with convicted sex offender Epstein, discussed Trump strategy, and was part of Epstein's legal/media response team

michael_wolff_relationship.identity: Michael Wolff - Journalist, author of 'Fire and Fury' (2018) and 'Siege' (2019)

key_communications.content: Wolff advises Epstein: 'Trump offers an ideal opportunity' for 'counter narrative' - 'becoming an anti-Trump voice gives you a certain political cover'
Wolff sends Epstein Hollywood Reporter article about Trump
Epstein introduces Wolff to Ken Starr; Wolff: 'Jeffrey has long told me about your friendship and the respect he has for you'
Wolff to Starr: 'I'm now at work on a sequel focusing on the legal case against Trump'
Epstein sends Wolff BuzzFeed article about Trump misconduct
Epstein BCC'd on invitation to Wolff's 'Siege' book launch party at 15 West 67th Street

wolff_advice_to_epstein.strategy: Use Trump as weapon against Patterson book
key_quotes: Trump offers an ideal opportunity. It's a chance to make the story about something other than you
becoming an anti-Trump voice gives you a certain political cover which you decidedly don't have now
this necessary involves you going public... writing an op-ed, doing a high profile television interview (Charlie Rose, I'd say)
Because this will be tied to the election, the Trump-Clinton angle will amp up the attention 10-fold

michael_wolff_relationship.significance: Author of major anti-Trump books was advised by and connected through Epstein; Epstein facilitated Wolff-Ken Starr connection for 'Siege' research

abc_news.subject: Meeting request about Trump and Clinton connections to Epstein
abc_news.quote: Seeing that both former President Clinton and Mr. Trump have been mentioned in connection to the Jeffrey Epstein case, I am interested in better understanding the case

cnn_investigation.subject: Whether Trump/Clinton had sexual relations with minors on Epstein's island
cnn_investigation.quote: We are trying to determine whether there is any truth to the allegations that either or both of these men may have had sexual relations with minors while there
cnn_investigation.approach: Contacted Epstein's pilot via LinkedIn asking for off-record conversation

sultan_bin_sulayem_connection.identity: Sultan Bin Sulayem - Chairman of DP World, Dubai World Group
sultan_bin_sulayem_connection.content: Forwarded Clinton speech attacking Trump to Epstein, mocked Trump's claim of foreign policy experience from Miss Universe pageant
sultan_bin_sulayem_connection.significance: Major Dubai business figure in regular email contact with Epstein during 2016 election

white_house_fellowship_connection.finding: Discussion of someone named 'Somers' receiving White House Fellowship Commission appointment from Trump
white_house_fellowship_connection.channel: Through Woody and Suzanne Johnson (NY Jets owners, Trump bundlers)
white_house_fellowship_connection.epstein_warning: careful she is nottrustworthy at ALLL
